overview:
Jay Thadeshwar is a young Entrepreneur and Blogger from India. He started a venture at 20 during college and developed a news website dedicated to Technology, Social Media, Web, Start-ups and Entrepreneurship. He graduated from Narsee Monjee College of Commerce and Economics and currently pursuing masters. He also works as CEO and Editor in Chief at his TechTheBest.com.

Jay believes in simple logic - “Everyone has some special attributes and a will to show them off, let them ! It creates a platform.”

He is planning to start an educational social network integrated to smartphones and he is also on his way of starting a localized news network on web.

degrees.subject: Business Management
degrees.institution: Narsee Monjee College of Commerce and Economics
